text: Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno upaṭṭhitā sati hoti asammuṭṭhā satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti
edit: Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno upaṭṭhitā sati hoti asammuṭṭhā satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti

translations.transtext: In which occasion, monks, the monk's established mindfulness is not forgetful, in that occasion the monk's mindfulness-factor of the enlightenment gets started.
